translations: 玩耍；轻快地跑；轻易地取胜

sentences.sentence: Kids just love being able to romp around in the fresh air without having to wrap up warm.
sentences.translation: 孩子们就是喜欢在新鲜的空气里嬉闹，无须穿得太暖和。

sentences.sentence: The word they came up with was "restaur-romp."
sentences.translation: 对于上述情形，该词典提供的词是“restaur-romp”。
